Hello,

I'm trying to learn more about Heritrix, so I downloaded the intro
=
file listed in the user's manual:

  http://crawler.archive.org/An%20Introd=
uction%20to%20Heritrix.pdf

Unfortunately I can't read it in either Acrobat=
 Reader (v8.1.0 for Mac
OS X 10.4, power pc) or Preview (v3.0.9 build 409).=
  The pages are
almost completely blank, and what little text that does dis=
play is not
understandable by itself.  Acrobat Reader gives me this error

=
    Cannot extract the embedded font 'FTXWSG
    +TimesNewRomanMS'.  Some c=
haracters may not
    display or print correctly.

Um, is there a more rece=
nt version of the introduction?  Or maybe an
HTML version somewhere?  I dow=
nloaded the latest trunk version from
the svn repository and it had the sam=
e problem.

Thanks,
Eric
